channel.title: javascript on Peter Villano's Personal Site
channel.description: Recent content in javascript on Peter Villano's Personal Site

item.title: Hanoi
item.description: "use strict" const t0 = Date.now() function pole(ring, time) { let x = (time + (1 (ring + 1)) % 3 if (ring % 2 === 1) { x = 3 - x } return (x + 3) % 3 } function accelDecel(t) { if (t = 0; i--) { const p = pole(i, seconds) if (p !== pole(i, seconds + 1)) { console.log(i) discInMotion = i continue } const centerX = (p + 0.
